about.title: About
about.tagline: Thanks for stopping by. Read below to learn more about my background and experience.

background.title: Background
background.p1: Full Stack Developer with over 4 years of experience, specializing in developing and optimizing software systems. I'm passionate about leveraging new technologies to solve complex problems and improve software performance.
background.p2: My expertise includes Nest.JS, Angular, Node, CodeIgniter, PHP, JavaScript, and various database systems. I've successfully migrated legacy systems to modern architectures, implemented B2B integrations, and developed SaaS applications for candidate evaluations and psychometric tests.
background.p3: I've led the design and implementation of comprehensive internal management systems, improving operational efficiency. I've also coordinated IT departments during leadership transitions, ensuring continuity and stability.

education.title: Education
